prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged appearance and earthy tones.
I want to design a mythical creature that embodies strength and resilience.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that resembles a giant boulder with unique patterns.
Make a legendary creature that has the power of earth and stone.
Imagine a Pokemon that looks like a mountain guardian, sturdy and imposing.
Show me a Pokemon with a rock-like body and minimalistic details.
Give me a rock-type Pokemon that emanates a sense of ancient wisdom.
